name: mosaic beanie
notes:
this mosaic beanie crochet pattern is so much easier than it looks! with just a 3 row repeat, without any color changes within a round, you can create this chevron style pattern!

materials--
100g/152yds worsted weight yarn (i used brava worsted in cobblestone heather and white)
4.5 mm hook
yarn needle
scissors

level--
intermediate

approx finsihed size--
20" x 7.5"
